List Price Services - {!List_Price_Services}

fields.name: Subtitle
fields.fieldText: ﻿This is a fixed price job, and an admin fee will be added to the below total once confirmed. If you are happy with the pre-admin fee total, click Confirm & Proceed to commit the change, and to calculate the admin fee.
